title: Battlecast Vel'koz model, created by Seaferrets
body:
{{champion:161}}

Fiance created this for me as a Christmas present! She crafted him from parts around the house, and his eye lights up as well:

http://i.imgur.com/i4UbHbp.jpg

I also got the vel'koz skin as a gift. It was her way of telling me to play vel'koz support more often since she is a Quinn main and sometimes fills the ADC role. :D

replies.body:
Woah! Your fianc√© has some serious skills, especially if he's made from stuff found around the house! 

He's awesome looking! :3
She loves metalworking :D I wrote her a "Twas the night before Christmas" poem about Poro Sejuani. :)
Oh, *heck* yes. I love the found object feel to this. Do you know specifically what it's made from?
She made it from "mostly soup cans, hardware wire, [a coke zero can], beads, and an LED light."
UGH SO COOL. She has a real talent.
I agree! I proposed to her last year on the top floor of the Eiffel Tower to show that I meant business. :)

http://i.imgur.com/ZDcnR0X.png

As an added bonus, I'll post this picture that Seaferrets doodled today for my birthday. :)
That looks better than the actual skin
That's awesome. Bonus awesome points for light up eyes!
